targets.query:
// need this 'default' table to substitute possibly missing sys_errors table if errors were not registered by ECS service
import "csv"
default_sys_errors = csv.from(csv:"#datatype,string,long,string,long
#group,false,false,true,false
#default,_result,,,
,result,table,_field,_value
,,100,succeed_request_counter_i,0
,,101,system_errors_i,0
,,102,user_errors_i,0")

totals = from(bucket: "monitoring_vdc")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cq_performance_transaction_delta")
|> range($range)
|> keep(columns:["_time", "_field", "_value"])
|> sum()
|> fill(column: "_value", value: 0)

sys_errors = from(bucket: "monitoring_vdc")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cq_performance_error_delta")
|> range($range)
|> keep(columns:["_time", "_field", "_value"])
|> sum()
|> fill(column: "_value", value: 0)

union(tables: [default_sys_errors, totals, sys_errors])
|> pivot(rowKey:[], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
// map does not save non-group columns
|> map(fn:(r) => ({
a_succeed_request_counter: r.succeed_request_counter_i,
b_system_errors: r.system_errors_i,
c_user_errors: r.user_errors_i,
d_error_rate: float(v:r.system_errors_i+r.user_errors_i)/
float(v:r.system_errors_i+r.user_errors_i+r.succeed_request_counter_i
// this trick is needed because failed+succeed can be 0, avoid printing NaN in this case
+int(v:bool(v:(r.system_errors_i+r.user_errors_i+r.succeed_request_counter_i)==0)))}))

panels.description: Rate of successful requests and failures per second

targets.query:
time_int = int(v:$__range_to_s) - int(v:$__range_from_s)
min_window = 300
max_windows = 200
sec_in_ns = 1000000000
window_len = time_int / max_windows / min_window * min_window
is_min_window = window_len < min_window
window_len = (int(v:(is_min_window)) * min_window) + (int(v:(not is_min_window)) * window_len)
wl_dur = duration(v:window_len * sec_in_ns)
start_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_from_s)/window_len) - 2) * window_len * sec_in_ns)
end_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_to_s)/window_len) + 1) * window_len * sec_in_ns)

from(bucket: "monitoring_vdc") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cq_performance_transaction" )
  |> range(start: start_dt, stop: end_dt)  
  |> keep(columns:["_time", "_field", "_value"])  
  |> window(every:wl_dur)
  |> mean()
  |> group(columns:["_field"]) 
  |> rename(columns: {_start: "_time"})

panels.title: TPS (success/failure)

panels.description: Data access bandwidth of successful requests per second

targets.query:
time_int = int(v:$__range_to_s) - int(v:$__range_from_s)
min_window = 300
max_windows = 200
sec_in_ns = 1000000000
window_len = time_int / max_windows / min_window * min_window
is_min_window = window_len < min_window
window_len = (int(v:(is_min_window)) * min_window) + (int(v:(not is_min_window)) * window_len)
wl_dur = duration(v:window_len * sec_in_ns)
start_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_from_s)/window_len) - 2) * window_len * sec_in_ns)
end_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_to_s)/window_len) + 1) * window_len * sec_in_ns)

from(bucket: "monitoring_vdc") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cq_performance_throughput" )
|> range(start: start_dt, stop: end_dt) 
|> keep(columns:["_time", "_field", "_value"]) 
|> window(every:wl_dur)
|> mean()
|> group(columns:["_field"]) 
|> rename(columns: {_start: "_time"})

panels.description: Rate of failed requests per second, split by error type (user/system)

min_window = 300

|> range(start: start_dt, stop: end_dt)

panels.title: Failed Requests/s by error type (user/system)

targets.query:
time_int = int(v:$__range_to_s) - int(v:$__range_from_s)
min_window = 300
max_windows = 200
sec_in_ns = 1000000000
window_len = time_int / max_windows / min_window * min_window
is_min_window = window_len < min_window
window_len = (int(v:(is_min_window)) * min_window) + (int(v:(not is_min_window)) * window_len)
wl_dur = duration(v:window_len * sec_in_ns)
start_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_from_s)/window_len) - 2) * window_len * sec_in_ns)
end_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_to_s)/window_len) + 1) * window_len * sec_in_ns)


all = from(bucket: "monitoring_vdc") 
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cq_performance_latency" )  
    |> range(start: start_dt, stop: end_dt)  
    |> window(every:wl_dur)
    |> mean()
    |> group(columns:["_field","id"])

// can't simple rename ttfb_read to Read, ti... and similarly for ttlb_write
// when they are in same stream
// TODO think about possible optimizations:
// 1. use function? didn't work at first approach, flux can't see it
// 2. use join with another table created from CSV

reads = all |> filter(fn: (r) => r.id == "ttfb_read" )
    |> set(key: "id", value: "Read, time to first byte")

writes = all |> filter(fn: (r) => r.id == "ttlb_write" )
    |> set(key: "id", value: "Write, time to last byte")

union(tables: [reads, writes])|> map(fn:(r) => ({_time: r._start, _value: r._value, _field: r.id + ", " + r._field })) |>drop(columns:["id"])

panels.description: Rate of successful requests per second, by method

targets.query:
time_int = int(v:$__range_to_s) - int(v:$__range_from_s)
min_window = 300
max_windows = 200
sec_in_ns = 1000000000
window_len = time_int / max_windows / min_window * min_window
is_min_window = window_len < min_window
window_len = (int(v:(is_min_window)) * min_window) + (int(v:(not is_min_window)) * window_len)
wl_dur = duration(v:window_len * sec_in_ns)
start_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_from_s)/window_len) - 2) * window_len * sec_in_ns)
end_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_to_s)/window_len) + 1) * window_len * sec_in_ns)


from(bucket: "monitoring_vdc") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cq_performance_transaction_method" and r._field == "succeed_request_counter" )
|> range(start: start_dt, stop: end_dt) 
|> keep(columns:["_time", "_value", "method"]) 
|> window(every:wl_dur)
|> mean()
|> group(columns:["_field", "method"]) 
|> rename(columns: {_start: "_time"})

panels.title: Successful Requests/s by Method

panels.description: Rate of successful requests per second, by node

targets.query:
time_int = int(v:$__range_to_s) - int(v:$__range_from_s)
min_window = 300
max_windows = 200
sec_in_ns = 1000000000
window_len = time_int / max_windows / min_window * min_window
is_min_window = window_len < min_window
window_len = (int(v:(is_min_window)) * min_window) + (int(v:(not is_min_window)) * window_len)
wl_dur = duration(v:window_len * sec_in_ns)
start_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_from_s)/window_len) - 2) * window_len * sec_in_ns)
end_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_to_s)/window_len) + 1) * window_len * sec_in_ns)


from(bucket: "monitoring_main") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "statDataHead_performance_internal_transactions" and r._field == "succeed_request_counter"  )

|> range(start: start_dt, stop: end_dt) 
|> keep(columns:["_time", "_value", "host"]) 
|> derivative(nonNegative: true)
// see MONITORING-194 for details about next 2 lines
|> window(every:wl_dur)
|> mean()
|> group(columns:["_field", "host"]) 
|> rename(columns: {_start: "_time", host: "node"})

panels.title: Successful Requests/s by Node
